name: Maruti Ertiga
description: The price of Maruti Ertiga, a 7 seater MUV, ranges from Rs. 8.69  - 13.03 Lakh. It is available in 9 variants, with an engine of 1462 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Ertiga has an NCAP rating of 3 stars and comes with 4 airbags. Maruti Ertiga is available in 7 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 20.3 to 26.11 kmpl for Ertiga.
